alert.note: Alert for McHenry; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:42AM CDT until July 10 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WARD AND CENTRAL MCHENRY COUNTIES... At 441 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Granville, or 26 miles east of Minot, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Denbigh around 450 AM CDT. Towner around 505 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Voltaire, Berwick, Logan, Bergen, Simcoe and Norwich. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
